## Libraries

```{r libraries}
library(here)
library(fs)

library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
```

## Read data

```{r read_data}
messages <- readLines(here("messages.txt"))

msg_starts <- str_detect(messages, "^\\d\\d/\\d\\d/\\d{4}")

message_no <- cumsum(msg_starts)

messages <- map_chr(1:max(message_no),
                    \(x){
                      str_c(messages[message_no == x], collapse = "\n")
                    }
                    )


```
